description: So you want to build native mobile apps for iOS and Android, with JavaScript? Youâ€™ve certainly come to the right place. name: GETTING STARTED WITH {N} PART 2â€”BUILDING WITH THE {N} CLI AND VISUAL TOOLING
description: Whether you are a die-hard command-line developer or prefer the ease of point-and-click visual tooling solutions, NativeScript has your back. In this session youâ€™ll learn how to use the most important features of the NativeScript CLI. We will also dive into some new visual tooling offerings and see how they can supplement (and sometimes replace) functionality provided by the CLI.

name: 3 WAYS TO MAKE YOUR APP SMARTER
description: Youâ€™ve written a great NativeScript app that is fast and looks pretty. But it needs something a little extra to get noticed in the stores. Why not go the extra mile and send your app back to school? Weâ€™ll take the QuickNoms recipe app and enhance it with a sensor integration and two methods of adding Machine Learning to take a simple recipe app and turn it into something much more interesting.
